title: Bug 109718 - Tips in text item only display in one line when large content is entered
description: INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USERS TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. After saving the layout and hovering the mouse over the text item, the tips are displayed in a single line instead of the expected format.
OB: When hovering the mouse over the text item with large content, the tips are shown in one line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the given format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text item in the layout.
2. Enter the following content in the text item: 'Contents 1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'.
3. Save the layout.
4. Hover the mouse over the text item and observe the tips display.
